text: Milad Rabbani () is an Iranian football defender who currently plays for Iranian football club Esteghlal Ahvaz in the Iran Pro League. ==Club career== Rabbani started his career with Esteghlal Ahvaz from youth levels. He was promoted to first team after relegation to Division 2 in 2011. He was a regular starter in his first season with Esteghlal Ahvaz while he helped them to promoting to Division 1. As summer 2014 he joined to Esteghlal Khuzestan with a 3 years contract. He made his debut for Esteghlal Khuzestan as 31 October 2014 against Sepahan as a starter. ==Club career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Division !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Hazfi Cup !colspan="2"|Asia !colspan="2"|Total |- !
